meanings.definition: Make partial or minor changes to (something)
meanings.sent1: She is modifying her essay to improve it.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys modifying his car to make it faster.
meanings.sent3: The cat is modifying its position on the couch constantly.
meanings.sent4: The artist is modifying the painting with delicate brush strokes.
meanings.sent5: The chef is modifying the recipe to add more flavor.

meanings.definition: To change (a word or phrase) to make it less extreme or more polite
meanings.sent1: They are modifying the message to sound more friendly.
meanings.sent2: She always modifies her language to avoid offending anyone.
meanings.sent3: The robot is modifying its speech to be more diplomatic.
meanings.sent4: The teacher is modifying the feedback to be more constructive.
meanings.sent5: He is modifying his request to be more considerate.

meanings.definition: To change the form or qualities of (something)
meanings.sent1: The sculptor is modifying the clay to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: They are modifying the design to make it more user-friendly.
meanings.sent3: The magician is modifying the trick to surprise the audience.
meanings.sent4: The tailor is modifying the dress to fit perfectly.
meanings.sent5: He is modifying the presentation to be more engaging.
